alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Treutlen (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 2:42PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Laurens, central Emanuel, Treutlen and southeastern Johnson Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 241 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Cadwell to Orland to near Stillmore, and moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Swainsboro, Soperton, East Dublin, Twin City, Adrian, Dexter, Stillmore, Oak Park, Rentz, Nunez, Covena, Rockledge, Norristown, Minter, Harlow, Brewton, Zaidee, George L Smith State Park and Gillis Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
